definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
Zen saying repeated as cant/(fig.) catchphrase/mantra/favorite expression/stock phrase
pet phrase/regularly used expression/manner of speaking

sentences.english: "Never say never" is one of my new expressions.
sentences.chinese: 如今，“决不说‘决不’”成了我新的口头禅之一。

sentences.english: He was not free enough, was how he preferred to phrase it.
sentences.chinese: 他没有多少空闲时间，是他喜欢说的一句口头禅。

sentences.english: The dreamer objected (verbally) to the interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 作梦者口头上反对这种解析。

sentences.english: The safest form is to nod and give a verbal salutation.
sentences.chinese: 最安全的方式就是点头，并给予口头称呼。

sentences.english: Students are also required to assess their project in a final oral presentation.
sentences.chinese: 学生也需以期终口头简报方式来评估其专题。

sentences.english: Use them respectfully in both oral and written communication.
sentences.chinese: 充满敬意地在口头和书面交流中使用它们。

sentences.english: Folk memories are oral traditions handed down over the years by word of mouth.
sentences.chinese: 民间故事是许多年来人们口头承传下来的一些传统。

sentences.english: But now we have to execute, not only say the words.
sentences.chinese: 但我们要付诸实施，不能停留在口头上。

sentences.english: The deadline for submissions of WPA section and zonal symposia, oral communications, and posters is November 30.
sentences.chinese: 通讯口头提交意见书的截止日期是11月30日。

sentences.english: We don't really believe what we give lip service to.
sentences.chinese: 我们并不相信我们口头的说法。

sentences.english: Hence, they possessed the ability to understand verbal communication—and to speak themselves!
sentences.chinese: 从此，他们获得了理解口头交流和自我交流的能力。

sentences.english: PLEO rb will then respond after it hears your verbal command.
sentences.chinese: 瑞宝会在听到您的口头命令后作出回应。

sentences.english: Students give oral reports and participate in discussions and group projects.
sentences.chinese: 学生们做口头报告并参与讨论及小组计划。

sentences.english: We'll get dhave(stop, won't practise)the oral composition the period.
sentences.chinese: 这节课咱们不做口头字词作品。

sentences.english: Mercury was used in the form of ointments, oral administration, and vapor baths.
sentences.chinese: 水银以软膏，口头的管理，并且蒸汽洗澡形式被使用。

definition: to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
polite phrase/conventional greetings/cliché/to try to worm facts out of sb
to elaborate (on a theme)/to expound (the classics)/perfunctory/to skimp/to botch/to do sth half-heartedly or just for show/barely enough to get by
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
